title.value: A Study of Human-Robot Handover through Human-Human Object Transfer
title.justification: This is the title of the paper.
title.quote: A Study of Human-Robot Handover through Human-Human Object Transfer

extractions.description: The paper presents a preliminary study investigating changes in human handover behavior when transferring objects with varying risk levels, using a high-resolution touch sensor. The study involved participants handing over a safe object (empty cup) and a hazardous object (full cup) while being monitored for tactile behavior changes. The authors found a distinct difference in handover duration between the full and empty cup, with the former being slower and exhibiting altered tactile behavior due to the risk factor. The study emphasizes the need for a deeper understanding of tactile factors in risky handovers to enhance safety in human-robot interactions.

type.justification: The authors conduct experiments to study human handover behavior.
type.quote: In this preliminary study, we investigate changes in handover behaviour when transferring hazardous objects with the help of a high-resolution touch sensor.

name.justification: The paper focuses on studying human handover behavior to inform the design of safer and more efficient human-robot interactions.
name.quote: As robots integrate into society, ensuring safe and efficient human-robot interactions will be crucial.
